name: FESTIVUS Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 4-letter word for a particular number from 1-10.
questions.explanation:
Five.

	Only "five" can be spelled using letters from FESTIVUS.  One, two, three, four, FIVE, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 5-letter word for a fancy, houselike hotel room.
questions.explanation:
Suite.

	Suites usually have a living room, a kitchen, and at least one bedroom.  On "The Suite Life of Zack and Cody", the Martins live in a suite.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters from FESTIVUS, that means tuxedo.
questions.explanation:
Suit.

	A suit usually consists of a matching pair of pants and a jacket.  Sometimes a suit will also have a vest, which is called a three-piece suit.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word that is a sleeveless garment that goes over a shirt and usually goes under a jacket, using only letters from FESTIVUS.
questions.explanation:
Vest.

	Vests make a suit a three-piece suit.  In a three-piece suit, there is a vest, a jacket, and a pair of pants, all of which match.  Usually, a dress shirt and necktie or bow tie is also worn underneath the vest.

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 4-letter word meaning a closed hand.
questions.explanation:
Fist.

	When you make a fist, you are curling all of your fingers, including your thumb, in.  It creates a ball-like shape, and the tips of your fingers are hidden.  This is what you would make to punch something (but please, do not punch anything living!).

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 3-letter word meaning to be seated.
questions.explanation:
Sit.

	To sit down means to be seated.  When you are seated, you have sat down.  Sat is the past tense of sit.

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 3-letter word for a doctor who works on animals.
questions.explanation:
Vet.

	A vet, or a veterinarian, is the person who works on your pet, much like a doctor works on humans.  A vet can also be the place where you take your animal to get worked on.  The vet is where you go to give your dog or cat its shots.

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 4-letter word meaning to complain.
questions.explanation:
Fuss.

	If you are making a fuss, you are complaining about all the little things that do not matter.  For instance, if you complain about the scent of your shampoo, you are making a fuss.  The scent really doesn't matter (unless, of course, you are allergic to the scent, in which case, fuss all you want).

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word meaning capable or healthy, using only letters from FESTIVUS.
questions.explanation:
Fit.

	When you are fit, you usually are healthy and eat right.  You could also be capable, which means you are able to do something.  You can also have a fit, meaning that you are either fussing, or getting an illness.

questions.text: Using only letters from FESTIVUS, find a 3-letter word for something you might wear around your neck.
questions.explanation:
Tie.

	A tie can be a necktie, a bowtie, a bollo tie, or any other kind of tie.  To tie can also mean to knot something.
